values: Delighting in God for the Sake of His Supreme GloryDelighting in God for the Sake of His Supreme Glory

God is the one being in the universe for whom self-exaltation is the greatest act of love, and if we would truly reflect him, we must be satisfied in him above anything else. God is the one being in the universe for whom self-exaltation is the greatest act of love, and if we would truly reflect him, we must be satisfied in him above anything else.
